comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110228 Firefox/4.0b13pre
Build Identifier: 

WebMarker functionality:
1) very usefull for personal use
2) very useful for communication
3) very light (not overbloated) functionally


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. install (on the /old/ FF) and try


Expected Results:  
Built-in functionality (at least "mark" and "copy link") and possible API (for using in a session storage at least)

comments.raw_text:
<<Which product is affected by the problem you would like to report?
Core:
Shared components used by Firefox and other Mozilla software, including */handling of Web content/* (HTML, CSS, scripts, images, networking, etc.).>>
Well, muv it 2 appropriate.
